bioghist.p: H. Edmund Curch was a Disciples of Christ clergyman. He served in various Michigan communities, including Trowbridge and Belding.

scopecontent.p: The H. Edmund Curch collection includes correspondence and other materials concerning pastorates in Trowbridge and Belding, Michigan. There are also papers relating to organizational work for the denomination, including establishing new congregations and arrangements for holding conventions and conferences. Also retained were related state and national denominational printed material. Some of the papers are of his wife, Nettie Curch.
